Geometry

Class Vector2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Geometry.Vector2D

  • public class Vector2D
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a vector in 2D coordinates

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector2D(double directionX, double directionY) 
      Vector2D(Vector2D other) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAngle(Vector2D other)
      Returns the angle between the vector and another
      double getDirectionX()
      Returns the X component of the vector.
      double getDirectionY()
      Returns the Y component of the vector.
      double getDotProduct(Vector2D other)
      Returns the dot product of the vector with another.
      double getMagnitude()
      Returns the magnitude of the vector.
      double getSquaredMagnitude()
      Returns the squared magnitude of the vector.
      void reflect(Vector2D reflectionVector)
      Reflects the vector against another
      void rotate(double radians)
      Rotate the vector an angle
      void setDirection(double directionX, double directionY)
      Sets both X and Y components of the vector
      void setDirectionX(double directionX)
      Sets the X component of the vector.
      void setDirectionY(double directionY)
      Sets the Y component of the vector.
      void setMagnitude(double magnitude)
      Changes the X and Y component in order to obtain a new magnitude without change the direction of the vector.
